lines.text: You know, it's a funny thing. Even when I hated you, I loved you.

[speaking of black pearls]
If anyone can help us find those black beauties, it's your friend George. Hadn't ought to take too much coaxing, for a woman of your experience.
You ought to know. You helped me get it.

[to Rita Delaine]
Let's go to the temple and ask the gods not to punish us for what you've done.
